Comment: All I can say is thank goodness we have a president who enforces the law and sticks true to the Constitution.

Comment: Yonaiker Gallegos, who had been using the name Yoniaker(sic) Rafel Martinez-Ramos, was already in local custody on misdemeanor charges for blank checks and possession of a deceptive government ID.  He was located by Homeland Security Investigations (HSI) on April 22, according to a senior Trump administration official. Agents were able to determine that Martinez-Ramos was likely a fake identity after obtaining information about the items in his possession when he was arrested by local authorities.   Senator Van Hollen, what next?
Author: Sure-Wishbone-4293
